Highlighted Clause: You agree to abide by osmfâs usage policies and other policies posted on the osmf website in conjunction with the services, including accompanying documentation.
Plain Language Summary: You must follow all the usage and policy guidelines provided on the OpenStreetMap Foundation (OSMF) website when using their services.

Highlighted Clause: You must be 13 years or older to use the services.
Plain Language Summary: You need to be at least 13 years old to use OSMF's services.

Highlighted Clause: You are free to stop using the services any time.
Plain Language Summary: You can choose to discontinue using OSMF’s services whenever you wish.

Highlighted Clause: You are legally responsible for your edits and contributions.
Plain Language Summary: You are personally accountable for any changes or content you contribute to OSM and could face legal action if your contributions break the law.

Highlighted Clause: We do not represent or guarantee the truthfulness, accuracy, or reliability of any submitted community content.
Plain Language Summary: OSMF is not responsible for verifying or ensuring the truth or reliability of content contributed by users.

Highlighted Clause: Your use of the services is at your sole risk.
Plain Language Summary: You use OSMF services at your own risk, and the foundation does not warranty the service for your specific requirements or its continuous operation.

Highlighted Clause: We may modify, suspend, or terminate your access to or use of our Services anytime for any reason.
Plain Language Summary: OSMF can change, pause, or stop your access to their services at any time for any reason, including rule violations.

Highlighted Clause: You agree that no joint venture, partnership, employment, or agency relationship exists between you and osmf as a result of these terms or your use of the services.
Plain Language Summary: Using OSMF's services does not create any legal partnership or employment relationship between you and OSMF.

Highlighted Clause: We may cancel or suspend your account for violation of any policy as determined by the data working group or other working group.
Plain Language Summary: Your account may be cancelled or suspended if you violate policies as decided by OSMF’s working groups.

Highlighted Clause: By registering as a user or providing personal information on the services, you represent that you are at least 16 years old.
Plain Language Summary: You confirm that you are 16 or older when you sign up as a user or provide personal information to OSMF services.

Highlighted Clause: In no event shall our liability exceed one thousand British pounds (GBP 1000.00) in aggregate.
Plain Language Summary: OSMF’s potential financial liability to you will not be more than 1000 British pounds in total.

Highlighted Clause: You may not have access to data that you stored on the services after we cancel or suspend your account.
Plain Language Summary: If your account is cancelled or suspended, you might lose access to any data you have stored on OSMF services.

Highlighted Clause: All changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the osmf website unless they specify a later date.
Plain Language Summary: Any changes to OSMF’s terms will take effect as soon as they are posted on the website unless a different effective date is stated.
